message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to you. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $10,000?

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,000 might be a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you can take advantage of it. Let me know what you think!
